subject: National Invitation Tournament
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Damarcus Harrison scored 14 of his 16 points in the second half as Clemson beat Belmont, 73-68, to reach the National Invitation Tournament semifinals.
snippet: Damarcus Harrison scored 14 of his 16 points in the second half as Clemson beat Belmont, 73-68, to reach the National Invitation Tournament semifinals.
